snippet: The America’s Cup coming to Bermuda in June 2017 has helped invigorate the real estate market, which lost ground after the world financial crisis.
abstract: International House Hunting column; four-bedroom midcentury house on Riddell’s Bay Golf Course in Warwick Parish, Bermuda, is listed at $5.65 million; information about market and tips for buying properties in Bermuda highlighted.
lead_paragraph: The America’s Cup coming to Bermuda in June 2017 has helped invigorate the real estate market, which lost ground after the world financial crisis.
